spec_data.Name: erlang-bear
spec_data.Description:
A set of statistics functions for Erlang. Currently bear is focused on use
inside the Folsom Erlang metrics library but all of these functions are generic
and useful in other situations.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 12:12:06 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A set of statistics functions for erlang
